content: 2 things I’d like to say: [1] The Wolves/Celtics game was neck-and-neck until Minneapolis Xavi went to the bench with 4 fouls fairly early in the 3rd. The proper spelling of his name is Earvin “Magic” Rubio. [2] I truly had been thinking before tonight that a worthwhile use of my time would be recording a song dedicated to Dave Joerger about how Skal Labbissiere might be his best player and he should play him more, probably called “Skalding.” Feeling validated.
